MOVAhome Welcome to MOVAhome App! Please read carefully and agree with User Agreement and Privacy Policy to allow us to collect, use, store, and share your information. With it you are obtaining a high-quality product that is engineered for optimal performance, achieving intelligent remote control, connection, device sharing and other functions. Wi-Fi passsword Connect to Wi-Fi network Add Device Next I have heard the voice prompt of Wi-Fi reset. Connect to Wi-Fi Network 1. Wi-Fi coverage: For a good Wi-Fi connection, place your phone and device/station to the area in a good Wi-Fi coverage. 2. Location permission: The location permission is required for Wi-Fi network connection. 3. 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network: In order to connect the device, please make sure the 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network or 2.4GHz/5GHz mixed Wi-Fi network is working. 4. If your home router is broadcasting two networks, with different names to indicate the 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands. Make sure your phone is connecting to the 2.4GHz network. Please make sure the connected home Wi-Fi network is 2.4GHz or 2.4/5GHz mixed network. Your phone Wi-Fi (WLAN) is off, please turn it on and try again. System Permission Request This app will request the system location permissions for network configuring, nearby device scanning, Wi-Fi network identifying, country / region recognizing. 

If the app cannot access the preceding permissions, the corresponding functions will NOT work while the basic functions of the app are still available. 

You can turn off or on the permissions at any time via Settings > Permissions. This app will request system camera and photo permissions for profile photo settings and function feedback. 

If the app cannot access the preceding permissions, the corresponding functions will NOT work while the basic functions of the app are still available. 

You can turn off or on the permissions at any time via Settings > Permissions. This app will request the system camera, photo, and microphone permissions for video calls and submitting feedback. 

If the app cannot access the preceding permissions, the corresponding functions will NOT work while the basic functions of the app are still available. 

You can turn off or on the permissions at any time via Settings > Permissions. This app will request the device ID (IMEI) permissions for product improvement, personalized service, and after-sales service. 

If the app cannot access the preceding permissions, the corresponding functions will NOT work while the basic functions of the app are still available. 

You can turn off or on the permissions at any time via Settings > Permissions.

That link will be expired once you link to this current %s account. Please confirm whether you want to link this new %s account. An email, mobile number, and/or third-party account must be linked. Failed to link due to timeout. Please try again. The system cannot find this account. Would you like to create a new one？ The account has already existed. Please confirm to link now.

Add pictures or videos Customer Service Are you sure you want to unlink the Alexa? The file cannot be uploaded because it is too large. Upload issue logs
Video compressing, %d It is recommended that you confirm the following items in advance to make sure a smooth network configuration. 1.Please confirm that mobile phone, the device and home Wi-Fi are all set in line, and make sure that mobile phone and the device are both placed at a location where network signal could be well received in the house. 2.Please ensure that the location permission of "MOVAhome" App is enabled. 3.Please ensure that mobile phone and the device are connected to the same 2.4G Wi-Fi network. 4.Do Not configure the network with multiple mobile phones at the same time. Start network configuration Video tutorial for network configuration You can learn how to configure network for the device by watching the following video. Please check whether the "location permission" of MOVAhome App has been enabled. You can find the corresponding App on the "Settings" page of mobile phone to enable it. Please check whether the access right to the "local Network" of MOVAhome App has been enabled. You can find the corresponding app on the "Settings" page of mobile phone to enable it. Please check whether the MOVAhome App is updated to the latest version. If you use a dual-band router at home, and it emits two different hotspot names; please ignore Wi-Fi hotspot signal of 5G frequency band on mobile phone, and make sure that the phone is connected to a 2.4G hotspot. Please check whether the router is set with "Do not allow other devices to join", or blocks MAC addresses. It is recommended that you re-set the Settings and then configure network again. Network configuration does not support VPN or proxy server. Networks that require web authentication or certificates are not supported. The device does not support routers with a hidden hotspot name. The Wi-Fi hotspot name must be visible for the phone to recognize it and make connection. Causes of network configuration failure Check causes of network configuration failure Please look up causes of failure as below If you still cannot solve the network configuration problem, please contact our customer service. Please check whether the Wi-Fi network name and corresponding password are correct; if not, please rectify as soon as possible. It is recommended that you use a combination of letters and numbers as the network name and password, and avoid using special characters or Chinese characters.
Version update The latest version: %s Non-Wi-Fi environment currently, continue to update? Update to the latest version to experience a more excellent MOVA. Receiving device functioning and error messages Receiving device sharing You do not have devices to share. No sharing device yet. MOVAhome requires Bluetooth permission to scan-find nearby devices. Go to enable Bluetooth permission is not yet enabled. Please keep your mobile phone close to the device to be added. Nearby devices not found, please add manually. Scan for automatic network configuration MOVAhome requires location permission to scan nearby Wi-Fi networks. Incorrect Wi-Fi password is one of the most common causes of network configuration failure; please check Wi-Fi password carefully. Choose Wi-Fi Saved Wi-Fi Choose other Wi-Fi Speaker tutorial Speaker voice command tutorial Speaker tutorial for designating room cleaning
Shortcuts This operation will interrupt the current task. Continue? Set up shortcuts Wi-Fi management IP address Password Weak Strong Please make sure that you have entered the correct account and password for your home Wi-Fi. Save Wi-Fi The Wi-Fi already exists. Please do not add it again. Add multiple Wi-Fis 1. Users can add multiple Wi-Fis to the device. 2. If there is more than one Wi-Fi at your home, you can go to "Settings" > "Wi-Fi management" > "Add Wi-Fi" to add multiple Wi-Fis to your device. 3. When the current Wi-Fi signal is weak, the device will automatically switch to a stronger signal.
Common functions Add Wi-Fi Speaker connection tutorial
Summon to clean
Please check your mobile phone is connected to Wi-Fi or the mobile data is enabled to ensure that your mobile phone is always connected to the network. 1. Causes and solutions for the shut off and offline device The device is not powered on. Please long press the power button to restart the device. The device is shut off when the battery is depleted. Please place the device onto the charging dock to restart it. When the device is not being charged, and there has been no task command for a long time, the device will automatically turn off to protect the battery life. Please long press the power button to restart the device. 2. Causes and solutions for the offline device caused by the router Wi-Fi The router is faulty or the network is not stable. Please check and confirm the status of the router and then see if the device goes online. If the problem still exists, you can reset the Wi-Fi connection of the device, and reconnect it. Wi-Fi signal coverage or reception is poor, and the device may have gone to a cleaning area away from the Wi-Fi signal. The device will automatically go online after the signal is restored. The name or password for the router Wi-Fi has been changed. You can try to reconnect the device. 3. Causes and solutions for the offline device due to metal panels around it Check any large metal panel or interference source with electric motor around the device, such as refrigerator and microwave oven, etc. If any, place the device as far away as possible. Feedback Scan QR code to connect Where is the QR code? 1. The QR code is here.
The QR code is located under the cover of the device. 2. I can't find any QR code.
Some models do not support QR code scanning for network configuration. You can choose "Add", or go back to the "My Devices" page and select "Add Device" to add it. If you already have a device, click "+" to add. Try adding it manually? A device found Start connecting Ignore The password must have at least 8 characters and contain at least two of the following: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and special symbols. Multiple devices found The content contains sensitive words. Please retry. The number of Wi-Fi that can be connected to the robot has reached the limit.

To enable this function, click to log into MOVAhome. You can enable this function after entering the app and adding a device. Press and hold for a while to edit the widget My Devices The widget can be customized. When you have several devices, you can drag the button below to manage the priority order. Click to select a device to be associated with. Select a device After adding devices, you can select one of them to be associated with. Please ensure that the "Create Home Screen Shortcut" permission is enabled in Settings. Go to the device How to add widgets How to add widgets to your Home Screen From the Home Screen, touch and hold an empty area, then tap the button “+” in the upper-left corner. Enter "MOVAhome" in the search box. Tap Add Widgets. Done. How to add widgets to Today View Swipe right from the Home Screen to the far left of the screen, then tap the button "Edit" at the bottom. Tap the button “+” in the upper-left corner of the screen. Please install %s before sharing.

1. Please confirm that the current robot is turned on and has a 4-digit PIN code set. Prepare your robot 2. Please make sure that the robot is not bound 3. Please get your mobile phone, robot, and Wi-Fi prepared, and ensure that both the mobile phone and robot are covered with a good Wi-Fi signal. 4. Please make sure that the location permission of "MOVAhome" App is enabled. 5. Please make sure that your mobile phone and robot are connected to the same 2.4GHz Wi-Fi. 6. Do not configure the network with multiple mobile phones at the same time. Watch the video below to learn how to configure the network Bluetooth pairing Press and hold the knob for 3 seconds to start Bluetooth pairing mode. I have heard a voice prompt that Bluetooth pairing mode starts. Start pairing Bluetooth pairing… Bluetooth pairing succeeded Bluetooth pairing failed Robot is requesting for device pairing Robot has received a device pairing request Robot cannot receive a device pairing request Verify PIN code Already have a PIN code No PIN code has been set Check solutions Repair Solution 1. Failed to receive a device pairing request Please ensure that the distance between your robot and your phone is less than 10m and the robot is turned on. 2. No PIN code has been set No default PIN code when the robot leaves the factory. After the robot is turned on, please set a four-digit code on the display screen according to the instructions. Verify PIN code Enter the PIN code you set for the robot Wrong PIN code. Please try again. Wrong PIN code has been entered for 5 times. Please wait %s and try again later. Got it binding… Unable to bind the robot Robot has been bound before. 1. Linked successfully Log in to delete the robot from the list of devices and try again. If you forgot the account, please contact customer service to unbind it. Bluetooth bound successfully Bluetooth has been bound. You can connect to Wi-Fi for remote control of the robot. Bluetooth connection successful Bluetooth connected. Continue by connecting to a Wi-Fi network to enable remote control of the robot. Bluetooth connection failed Bluetooth connection failed. Please retry. Connect to Wi-Fi Try later Robot connecting to the network... Robot failed to connect to the network Connection successful Binding robot... The robot has been bound successfully Reconfigure the network Please follow troubleshooting steps as below: Whether the password is correct. Whether your device is within good Wi-Fi coverage. Ensure that the current Wi-Fi is the single-band network of 2.4 GHz frequency or the dual-band network of 2.4/5 GHz frequency. Ensure that the phone and the robot are connected to the same 2.4GHz Wi-Fi. Do not configure the network with multiple mobile phones at the same time. If the robot is bound to another account, you can log in to that account to remove it from the device list, then retry. If you forgot the account, please contact customer service to unbind it. Start mowing After mapping, tap the button to start mowing. Return to station After tapping, the robot will pause the current task and return to station. PIN verification error. To fix it, access the robot's control panel and change the PIN to “0001” through Settings > Change PIN. Then, re-establish the network connections. You'll be prompted to update the firmware. Once the update is completed, you will be able to change the PIN to your preference.
Your Account Login on Another Device Your account is already logged in on another device, please change your password if you do not perform this operation. Sent User Experience Program We sincerely invite you to join our User Experience Program. We would like to collect more feedback about your device and the MOVAhome App to enhance our product features and user experience. For details, please refer to <a href="privacy">Privacy Policy</a>. Incorrect account or password, please try again. Pictures/videos
1) Make sure that the charging dock is powered on and the white light is on; 2) Turn on the rocker switch of the robot's bottom; 3) Place the robot on the charging dock correctly. Make sure that the charging contacts of the robot's bottom connect to the ones of the charging dock, and wait for 5 seconds; 4) When you hear a prompt tone for powering on, the button indicator lights up. Then click "Next".
Contact Us For urgent issues, please <a href="contact_us">contact us</a>. Customer Service Center Due to system limitations, it may fail to add widgets within app. If so, add to your phone's home screen. More Encouragement, Better Performance Your encouragement will help us do better! Five-Star Rating Suggest to Improve
